name: Lucky VS Aliens
description:
Play for the penguin, who must protect his cows from UFOs! Do not let the aliens pick up their cows and hit the flying saucer with dynamite and a built catapult! You have to move fast, shoot a lot, and throw explosives at an alien ship in order to protect your small farm.

Features:
- Fun and fast gameplay
- Primary and secondary weapons
- Nice, stylized graphics
- New gaming experience
- Earn points and open additional weapons
